Package org.codehaus.enunciate.contract.validation

Validation processing classes and utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConfigurableRules  
Validator Validator for the Enunciate model.
 

Class Summary
BaseValidator A validator that doesn't do any validation work.
DefaultValidator Default validator.
EmptyNamespaceValidator Validator that ensures no API elements are in the empty namespace.
ValidationMessage  
ValidationResult The result of validation.
ValidatorChain Chains a set of validators.
 

Exception Summary
ValidationException A validation exception is thrown if any validation errors occur during validation.
 

Package org.codehaus.enunciate.contract.validation Description

Validation processing classes and utilities.
